jodd.mail

Interface ReceiveMailSessionProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImapServer, ImapSslServer, Pop3Server, Pop3SslServer

    public interface ReceiveMailSessionProvider
    Create email receiving sessions.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ReceiveMailSession createSession()
      Creates new receiving mail session.
      ReceiveMailSessionProvider setProperty(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value)
      Sets the mail session property.

    • Method Detail

      • createSession

        ReceiveMailSession createSession()
        Creates new receiving mail session.

      • setProperty

        ReceiveMailSessionProvider setProperty(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String value)
        Sets the mail session property. They must be set before the session is created.
